q: "In addition to creating the jobs of the future, clean energy benefits the U.S. economy by ultimately making energy costs more affordable for consumers- especially if their dollars stay in America," Sergio Marchionne said. Hydraulic hybrid vehicle technology is one more promising path worth pursuing in the effort to reduce our carbon footprint, and we are excited to partner with the EPA to push forward on this track. EPA's hydraulic hybrid technology, developed in the agency's lab in Ann Arbor is coming into use in large delivery and refuse trucks across the country. 's 2009 bankruptcy. Chrysler sold 1.52 million cars in 2010, helping it to boost its market share in the vital domestic U.S. market to 9.2 percent, from 8.8 percent the year before. It can be safely said that what Chrysler delivered last year, on both the product and financial fronts, surpassed many expectations, chief executive Sergio Marchionne said.
